meanings.definition: The process of separating into layers.
meanings.sent1: The delaminations in the cake layers made it easy to add the filling.
meanings.sent2: The construction worker noticed delaminations in the paint layers of the old building.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked that the delaminations in the lasagna were intentional for extra flavor.
meanings.sent4: The artist used delaminations in the painting to create a sense of depth and texture.
meanings.sent5: The geologist explained how delaminations in the rock layers revealed the history of the land.

meanings.sent1: Careful handling prevented any delaminations in the fragile paper.
meanings.sent2: The technician observed delaminations in the layers of the electronic device.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they tried to create delaminations in the sticker layers.
meanings.sent4: The detective carefully examined the delaminations in the evidence bag.
meanings.sent5: The chef demonstrated how to avoid delaminations when separating the pastry layers.

meanings.definition: The state of being split into layers.
meanings.sent1: The delaminations in the ice cream cake created a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent2: The engineer studied the delaminations in the composite material.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved creating delaminations in the deck of cards.
meanings.sent4: The storm caused delaminations in the bark layers of the tree.
meanings.sent5: The tailor fixed the delaminations in the fabric layers of the dress.
